vanilla-hammers.advancements.root.title: 原版錘
vanilla-hammers.advancements.golden_hamm: 挖掘大範圍區域的好方法
vanilla-hammers.advancements.stone_hamme: Start with the basics and craft a Stone Hammer.
vanilla-hammers.advancements.slime_hamme: Craft a Slime Hammer... how about whacking something with it?
vanilla-hammers.advancements.lapis_hamme: It's a Diamond Hammer, not a Lapis Hammer!
vanilla-hammers.advancements.prismarine_: Craft a Prismarine Hammer with the material of the seas.
vanilla-hammers.advancements.quartz_hamm: Begin your fiery conquest with a Quartz Hammer.
vanilla-hammers.advancements.golden_hamm: The Golden Hammer doesn't work well, but it sure does look cool!
vanilla-hammers.advancements.netherite_h: Craft a Netherite Hammer, forged with ancient gems from an unknown time.
vanilla-hammers.advancements.emerald_ham: Showcase your uniqueness with a Emerald Hammer.
vanilla-hammers.advancements.fiery_hamme: Finalize your descent with a Fiery Hammer.
vanilla-hammers.advancements.obsidian_ha: Craft an Obsidian Hammer and go mining for 17 hours without stopping.
vanilla-hammers.advancements.ender_hamme: Craft the Ender Hammer to end your mining woes.
vanilla-hammers.advancements.curse_of_gi: Find the rare Curse of Gigantism book, which can be used to power up a hammer at the cost of speed.
